******************************************************************************/class GlobalSettingsService{constructor(apiService){this.apiService=void 0;this.apiService=apiService;}getSettings(){return this.apiService.getGlobalSettings();}saveSettings(settings){return this.apiService.saveGlobalSettings(settings);}}export{GlobalSettingsService};
